name: indeed-job-scraper
title: Indeed Direct Job Scraper
description: Direct Indeed scraper that bypasses APIs to scrape jobs directly from Indeed.com, then enhances with company website data via SearchAPI

input.title: Input schema for Indeed Direct Job Scraper

jobTypes.title: Job Types
jobTypes.description: List of job types to search for on Indeed

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'United States', 'New York')

salaryMin.title: Minimum Salary
salaryMin.description: Minimum salary filter for job searches

maxPages.title: Max Pages Per Job Type
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape per job type

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests (keep low to avoid blocking)

useProxy.title: Use Proxy
useProxy.description: Whether to use residential proxies for anti-bot protection

saveToDataset.title: Save to Dataset
saveToDataset.description: Whether to save results to Apify dataset

pushToDatabase.title: Push to Database
pushToDatabase.description: Whether to push results to external database

databaseUrl.title: Database URL
databaseUrl.description: URL of the external database (if pushing to database)

databaseTable.title: Database Table
databaseTable.description: Name of the database table to insert jobs into

deduplicateJobs.title: Deduplicate Jobs
deduplicateJobs.description: Whether to check for and skip duplicate jobs when pushing to database

excludeFastFood.title: Exclude Fast Food
excludeFastFood.description: Whether to exclude fast food restaurants

testMode.title: Test Mode
testMode.description: Run in test mode (process fewer jobs and only send email to primary recipient)

visualMonitoring.title: Visual Monitoring
visualMonitoring.description: Enable headful browser mode (visible locally, better anti-detection on cloud)

jobAgeDays.title: Job Age (Days)
jobAgeDays.description: Maximum age of job postings to include (enter 1â€“30; internally mapped to supported values).
